cards.enDescription: With the website, our prices differ with you

cards.arDescription: يتم مراقبة جميع الرحلات من قبل فريقنا وقنوات التواصل مفتوحة في حال حدوث اي مكروه .. سلامتك تهمنا مع رايد
cards.enDescription: All trips are monitored by our team and communication channels are open in the event of anything bad happening. Your safety is important to us with Raid.

cards.arDescription: فريقنا متواجد لخدمتك في حال واجهتك اي مشكلة اثناء رحلتك
cards.enDescription: Our team is here to serve you if you encounter any problem during your trip
